#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
string a;
while(cin >> a){
        if( a == "#") break;
        int n = atoi(a.c_str());
       int s;
       if(n == 1) s = 1;
       if(n == 2) s = 5;
       if(n == 3) s = 4;
       else{
       	    int x = (((n/2)-(n/10)-1)*6)%10;
       	    int p = (n/5)-(n/10);
       	    int y = (p%2)*5;
       	    int z = ((n/2)+(1*(n%2))-2-p)%10;
       	    s = (x+y+z+4)%10;
       }
       cout << s << endl;
     }
     return 0;
}
